summary: On 16 January 1944, a reconnaissance pilot survives a plane crash in Delahaut in the Nazi occupied Belgium. The boy Jean Benoit finds the wounded pilot and brings him to the house of Claire... See full summary »
cast: Bill Paxton|Julia Ormond|Philippe Volter|Sandrine Bonnaire|Jean-Michel Vovk|Antoine Van Lierde|Ariane Schluter|Angelo Bison|Filip Peeters|Victor Reinier|Jappe Claes|Elie Lison|Quentin Milo|Hugues Hausman|Jacqueline Nicolas|Thibault Vinçon|Julien Lucas|Anthony Rombaut|Olivier Darimont|Phil Kaizer|Gert Jan Louwe|Marcel Hensema|Karl Jürgen Sihler|Marcel Faber|Jan van Eijndthoven|Sander de Heer|Willem Westermann|Jean Pol Nicolay|Anne Samain|Christian Courtois|Thierry de Coster|Catherine Mestoussis|Bella Wajnberg|Olivier Halleux|Ghislain Gilboux|Gilbert Yernaux|Serge Swysen|Carine Sombreuil|Robert Borremans|Tom Viebig|Rick Hancké|Olivier Bisback|Gert De la Marche|Jeroen Pater
title: Resistencia
